Statement of purpose/priorities: improve safety, enhance the economy, and protect the environment
Statements of Action: direct NOAA to seek public input before the Named Storm Event Model takes effect
allow NOAA to deploy sensors to areas in coastal states that are at the highest risk of experiencing geophysical events that would cause indeterminate losses
provide statutory authority for NOAA's National Water Center
Keywords: Integrated Coastal and Ocean Observation System (IOOS)
